name: Blood Hunter
description: Clever warriors who use forbidden hemocraft magic to hunt the monsters of the night.
hp_at_higher_levels: 1d10 (or 6) + your Constitution modifier per Blood Hunter level after 1st

1.name: Hunter's Bane
1.description: Gain advantage on Survival checks to track and Intelligence checks to recall information about fey, fiends, or undead and learn to channel hemocraft magic with a DC of 8 + proficiency bonus + Hemocraft modifier.

1.name: Blood Maledict
1.description: Use hemocraft to invoke blood curses, knowing one at this level. You can amplify a curse at the cost of hemocraft die damage and can use this feature once per rest.

2.name: Fighting Style
2.description: Adopt a style of fighting as your specialty.

2.name: Crimson Rite
2.description: As a bonus action, sacrifice hit points to imbue a weapon with elemental energy dealing hemocraft die damage. You learn one rite now and additional rites at higher levels.

3.name: Blood Hunter Order
3.description: Choose a blood hunter order, gaining features at 3rd, 7th, 11th, 15th, and 18th levels.

4.name: Ability Score Improvement
4.description: Increase one ability score by 2 or two ability scores by 1, or take a feat if allowed.

5.name: Extra Attack
5.description: You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

6.name: Brand of Castigation
6.description: When you damage a creature with a weapon imbued with a crimson rite, brand it to always know its direction and deal psychic damage when it harms you or an ally.

6.name: Blood Maledict (2/rest)
6.description: You can invoke your Blood Maledict feature twice between rests.

7.name: Order Feature
7.description: Gain a feature from your chosen Blood Hunter Order.

7.name: Crimson Rite Improvement
7.description: You learn an additional crimson rite.

8.name: Ability Score Improvement
8.description: Increase one ability score by 2 or two ability scores by 1, or take a feat if allowed.

9.name: Grim Psychometry
9.description: Gain advantage on Intelligence (History) checks to recall sinister or tragic events surrounding objects you touch or places you are in.

10.name: Dark Augmentation
10.description: Your speed increases by 5 feet and you add your Hemocraft modifier to Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws.

11.name: Order Feature
11.description: Gain a feature from your chosen Blood Hunter Order.

12.name: Ability Score Improvement
12.description: Increase one ability score by 2 or two ability scores by 1, or take a feat if allowed.

13.name: Brand of Tethering
13.description: Your brand deals double psychic damage, prevents the target from dashing, and damages creatures that attempt to teleport or leave the plane.

13.name: Blood Maledict (3/rest)
13.description: You can invoke your Blood Maledict feature three times between rests.

14.name: Hardened Soul
14.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed and frightened.

14.name: Crimson Rite Improvement
14.description: You learn an additional crimson rite.

15.name: Order Feature
15.description: Gain a feature from your chosen Blood Hunter Order.

16.name: Ability Score Improvement
16.description: Increase one ability score by 2 or two ability scores by 1, or take a feat if allowed.

17.name: Blood Maledict (4/rest)
17.description: You can invoke your Blood Maledict feature four times between rests.

18.name: Order Feature
18.description: Gain a feature from your chosen Blood Hunter Order.

19.name: Ability Score Improvement
19.description: Increase one ability score by 2 or two ability scores by 1, or take a feat if allowed.

20.name: Sanguine Mastery
20.description: Once per turn, when you roll a hemocraft die, you can reroll it and choose either result, and when you score a critical hit with a weapon with an active rite you regain one use of Blood Maledict.
